title: Enhanced polysulfide trapping in Li-S batteries by dipole alignment in ferroelectric BaTiO3
content:

Lithium sulfur (Li-S) batteries are a promising technology due to their high energy density and low cost. However, the polysulfide shuttle effect remains a significant cause of degradation in Li-S...
